entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - EDGAR/transform

[DQC.US.0001.81] The member IntersegmentEliminationMember is used on the axis StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis. The StatementBusinessSegmentsAxis should only be used with extension members and the following US-GAAP members: us-gaap:ReportableSegmentAggregationBeforeOtherOperatingSegmentMember, us-gaap:CorporateMember, us-gaap:AllOtherSegmentsMember, us-gaap:SegmentDomain, us-gaap:CorporateAndOtherMember. There are no facts associated with this member and axis.
Rule Element Id:81 Rule version: 26.0.9 -
